section.title: Components
section.para: This is an overview of the different components of Emergency Service project. THe following sections covers a detailed technical specificion about the the current implementation and is intended to serve as guideline to future improvements. Each module will mention and explain the architectural decisions that were made to implement the current version. The advantages and the drawbacks of each approach will be explained and also alternative methods will be proposed.

For different reasons, (like time, effort, deadlines, business requirements, environment restrictions, simplicity, etc.) some modules are in very early stages of development. For this reason, you can expect big changes in future versions until we get everything right. Feel free to give us feedback and help us to prioritize the features that you think that are the most important in your own projects.
